AI Description: The ARM GNU Toolchain is a collection of tools/libraries used to create applications for embedded ARM processors. It includes the GNU Compiler Collection (GCC) for compiling C/C++ code, GNU Binutils for creating/executing binary files, and GDB for debugging.
Core Features: Support For Compiling C/C++ Code For Arm Processors, Assembly Language Support, Highly Optimized Code Generation For Embedded Systems, Debugging Capabilities With Gdb, Open-Source Tools With Strong Community Support
General Tags: Compiler, Embedded Systems, Arm Processor, Toolchain
